#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#define N 2000005
#define pb push_back
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;

int t,n,a[N];

inline void sc(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
int neg = 0;
for(; ((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c=gc());
if(c=='-')
{
neg = 1;
c = gc();
}
for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = gc())
x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
if(neg)
x = -x;
}

int main()
{
  sc(t);
  while(t--)
  {
    int i;
    memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
    sc(n);
    int maxIn = 0;
    for(i=0;i<n;++i)
    {
      int in;
      sc(in);
      if(maxIn<in)
        maxIn = in;
      a[in]++;
    }
    int maxAns = 1;
    for(i=2;i<=maxIn;++i)
    {
      int count = 0,j;
      for(j=i;j<maxIn;j+=i)
      {
          count+=a[j];
      if(count>1)
      {  maxAns = i; break;}
      }
    }
    printf("%d\n",maxAns);
  }
}
